scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAC Caller
scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=1]%///[call_id] CSeq: 1 OPTIONS Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: [len]
